data.name: Is the flight safe?
data.description:
Is the flight safe?

At "Ventoso" airport you can fly, with small airplanes, to nearby airports.
Unfortunately, due to the very strong wind in that area, many airplanes are consuming
more fuel than expected and do not arrive at their destination.
Write a plan that helps you decide whether to take a certain flight
transfer (with a certain airplane and the wind forecast that day) is safe.
Each flight is characterized by: 1) Distance to travel to get to the desired nearest airport (km) 2) Headwind: km/h (if negative the wind is tail, i.e. favorable) 3) Airplane cruising speed (km/h)
(Remember: actual ground speed can change depending on the wind!) 4) Hourly consumption: liters per hour 5) Tank capacity: liters. PS: for safety it is better to keep the tank on landing with at least 10% of the fuel You will need to determine whether you will arrive safely at your destination (return 1) or run out of fuel first (return 0). 
//               1)        2)        3)         4)                5)
bool flight (int dist, int wind, int speed, int consumption, int tank)
{
    // return false or true
}
